title: Grace366
author: Grace366
content: Hello Everyone,We're looking for a talented community manager to join our Finxcoin project and help us build an engaged community. As a community manager for Finxcoin, you would play a crucial role. We're offering compensation in the form of tokens for a 6-month term, providing you with an opportunity to be part of our exciting venture and share in our success. You can learn more about Finxcoin by checking out our website at https://www.finxbit.com/#/.Please feel free to reach out at  https://t.me/Grace6228 with any questions or to express your interest.Best regards,Grace Salvatore

comments.author: Techdev
comments.created_time: April 14, 2023, 10:30:08 AMLast edit: May 20, 2023, 03:06:25 AM by Mr. Big
comments.body: I sent you a connection request on LinkedIn. I also left my Telegram in the other post. Reach me: @ElevatedWarriorJust don't pretend to be a woman, and using a European name yet you're an Indian man.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: If you still looking for your campaign  manager ,try look through this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5387456.0 if project is viable am sure you wont have a tough time finding  the perfect fit, good luck.
